amendment.description: An amendment numbered 95 printed in the Congressional Record to add the language of the bill titled Buy Low and Sell High Act.

action.text: Mr. Duncan raised a point of order against the Pallone amendment (A078). Mr. Duncan stated that the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Pallone.
